Scene:
The Head Identification (See also Kumagai's Camp)
(Kubi jikken (See also Kumagai jinya) / 首実検 (See also 熊谷陣屋))

Play: The Battle of Ichinotani (一谷嫩軍記)

Production: September 1971

– Click image to view.



Narrators (Tayu):

Takemoto Oritayū V (see also Takemoto Tsunatayū IX) (竹本織大夫 (五))



Shamisen Players:

Nozawa Katsutarō II (野澤勝太郎 (二))
